title: She will look beautiful in chains
author: VD
content_html:
The Lizard Queen (junior Internet edition) reveals an astounding naiveté:

I’m not sure I understand how I am any less capable of fighting the re-emergence of sex slavery than a man would be.

Why don’t you visit Germany, find some Ukrainian or Russian men and ask them that question. Then, after you’ve been beaten a few times and are properly broken in, you can ponder the subject when you’re not occupied with servicing your customers.
content_text:
The Lizard Queen (junior Internet edition) reveals an astounding naiveté:
I’m not sure I understand how I am any less capable of fighting the re-emergence of sex slavery than a man would be.
Why don’t you visit Germany, find some Ukrainian or Russian men and ask them that question.  Then, after you’ve been beaten a few times and are properly broken in, you can ponder the subject when you’re not occupied with servicing your customers.
